parameters.name: CycleTime
parameters.description: The days on which you want to execute O\&M events. Valid values: 1 to 7.

parameters.name: CycleType
parameters.description: The unit of the O\&M cycle. Set the value to Week.

parameters.name: MaintainEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the maintenance window.

parameters.name: MaintainStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the maintenance window.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable O\&M events.

*   1: yes.
*   0: no.
